sentences.en: A fountain of water gushed from the broken fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 从损坏的消防栓里喷出水来.

sentences.en: Adjustable support leg not shown in actual position relative to hydrant.
sentences.cn: 图示的可调节支撑架并不是相对于消防栓的实际位置.

sentences.en: At no time is there parking next to a fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 决不要将车停放在消防栓旁.

sentences.en: During rush hour, he saw a veer off the road and slam into a fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 在交通高峰时, 他看到一辆车在马路上转弯,撞到消防栓.

sentences.en: Families upstairs have to carry pails to the hydrant downstairs for water.
sentences.cn: 住在楼上的人家得提着水桶去楼下的水龙头打水.

sentences.en: I attached the hose to the hydrant and watered the flowers in the garden.
sentences.cn: 我把水管接上水龙头,浇了园子里的花.

sentences.en: I thought swimming was running through an open fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 游泳就是在灭火器里跑.

sentences.en: Ideal for use with client's existing hydrant meter hookup.
sentences.cn: 特别适用于用户现有的消防栓仪表连接.

sentences.en: It is not lawful to park in front of a hydrant.
sentences.cn: 在消火栓前停车是不合法的.

sentences.en: No feeding pump is foreseen for external fire hydrant system.
sentences.cn: 室外消火栓系统不设计给水泵.

sentences.en: On every floor there is a fire hydrant.
Ramp Control , UN 001, is there any fuel hydrant at gate 2?
sentences.cn: 现场, UN001, 2号廊桥有油井 吗 ?

sentences.en: Takes upward thrust when opening hydrant valve and reduces operating torque.
sentences.cn: 操作消防栓时会产生向上的推力,此零件能有效减少操作扭矩.

sentences.en: The teenager wrapped his car around the fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 这名青少年开车绕过消防栓.

sentences.en: You cannot chain your alligator to a fire hydrant.
sentences.cn: 你不可以将鳄鱼拴在消防龙头上.

words.tran_cn: 与水化合；成水合物（hydrate的过去分词形式）
